module.name: strings
module.function: Extract the text content part of any binary file with some ascii data in it This module uses the strings program to extract 8 bit ascii data, and dependant on the job argument 'endian' the 'big' or 'litle' endian version of 16 bit and 32 bit unicode data within the ascii range.

outputnode.name: output
outputnode.function: The ascii representation of the text data chunks of the input file
